alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Yukon Delta Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 26 at 2:07PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...West Coast Elevated Water Levels Monday Into Tuesday... Elevated water levels around 3 feet above the normal high tide line remain likely from the Yukon Delta to Norton Sound with 2 to 3 feet above the normal high tide line along the Bering Strait Coastlines Monday afternoon to Tuesday night as gusty south to southwest winds push through the region behind a front. These conditions may produce large breaking waves on shorelines and result in minor beach erosion. Coverage of sea ice will create uncertainty for the eastern half of Norton and Kotzebue Sounds if any large waves will be able to make it onshore. Stay tuned for updates to the forecast.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Yukon Delta Coast
